Iska matlab ye hai ki company aapko ek offer kar rahi hai jisme voucher diya aur cash nahi. Lekin agar aapko cash chahiye to aap company se negotiation karna chahiye. Ye kuch step follow karke kar sakte ho:

1. Company se contact karein aur puchhein kya aapko cash option de sakti hai.
2. Agar nahi de sakta to company ke terms and conditions check karein.
3. Agar bhi nahi to consumer complaint board se help le sakte ho.

Isse aapko help milegi ya phir alternative solution mil sakti hai.
